content.text:
I'm Claude Code, Anthropic's official CLI for Claude. I'm here to help you with software engineering tasks on your Nestogy MSP platform.

I can assist with:
- Code implementation and refactoring
- Bug fixes and debugging
- Database migrations and queries
- Testing (unit tests only per your rules)
- Architecture guidance following your DDD patterns
- Multi-tenant data scoping
- Laravel best practices

What would you like to work on today?
